<title level="1" pfs="">[Syu Tak-nwa (Level 16)](/NPCs.aspx?ID=1492)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 45

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 43

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 40
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 16">[Syu Tak-nwa (Level 16)](/NPCs.aspx?ID=1492)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Unique" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=161" />
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Human" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=90" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #167: Ready? Fight!](/Sources.aspx?ID=86) pg. 35</row>

**Perception** +29

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Goblin](/Languages.aspx?ID=6), [Tien](/Languages.aspx?ID=43), [Ysoki](/Languages.aspx?ID=61)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +28, [Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2) +27, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +29, [Medicine](/Skills.aspx?ID=9) +25, [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10) +25, [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11) +31, [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14) +29, [Thievery](/Skills.aspx?ID=17) +26

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +0

**Dex** +4

**Con** +2

**Int** +5

**Wis** +3

**Cha** +5
</row>

**Items**
_+3 [greater striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) jian_ (as [shortsword](/Weapons.aspx?ID=43))

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 37 

**Fort** +26 

**Ref** +29 

**Will** +28 

</row>

**HP** 250

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
hair +28 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Disarm](/Traits.aspx?ID=175), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [Grapple](/Traits.aspx?ID=184), [reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192), [Trip](/Traits.aspx?ID=196), [Unarmed](/Traits.aspx?ID=199)),
**Damage** 3d6+8 bludgeoning plus [Grab](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=18)

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
_jian_ +27 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)),
**Damage** 3d6+12 piercing

**Occult Prepared Spells** DC 38, attack +30
- **Cantrips (7th)**
[Daze](/Spells.aspx?ID=61), [Forbidding Ward](/Spells.aspx?ID=126), [Guidance](/Spells.aspx?ID=142), [Shield](/Spells.aspx?ID=280), [Telekinetic Projectile](/Spells.aspx?ID=334)
- **1st**
[Fear](/Spells.aspx?ID=110), [Ray of Enfeeblement](/Spells.aspx?ID=244), [True Strike](/Spells.aspx?ID=345)
- **2nd**
[Mirror Image](/Spells.aspx?ID=197), [Paranoia](/Spells.aspx?ID=214), [Silence](/Spells.aspx?ID=287)
- **3rd**
[Haste](/Spells.aspx?ID=147), [Paralyze](/Spells.aspx?ID=213), [Slow](/Spells.aspx?ID=289)
- **4th**
[Blink](/Spells.aspx?ID=27), [Confusion](/Spells.aspx?ID=48), [Phantom Pain](/Spells.aspx?ID=220)
- **5th**
[Black Tentacles](/Spells.aspx?ID=23), [Chilling Darkness](/Spells.aspx?ID=36), [Synesthesia](/Spells.aspx?ID=328)
- **6th**
[Feeblemind](/Spells.aspx?ID=112), [Repulsion](/Spells.aspx?ID=254), [True Seeing](/Spells.aspx?ID=344)
- **7th**
[Duplicate Foe](/Spells.aspx?ID=93), [Mask of Terror](/Spells.aspx?ID=185), [Warp Mind](/Spells.aspx?ID=369)
- **8th**
[Antimagic Field](/Spells.aspx?ID=14), [Dominate](/Spells.aspx?ID=87), [Mind Blank](/Spells.aspx?ID=192)

**Witch Hexes** DC 38, 3 Focus Points
- **Cantrips (8th)**
[Evil Eye](/Spells.aspx?ID=798)
- **8th**
[Cackle](/Spells.aspx?ID=792), [Curse of Death](/Spells.aspx?ID=794), [Malicious Shadow](/Spells.aspx?ID=800), [Needle of Vengeance](/Spells.aspx?ID=801)

**Choking Hair**   As long as Tak-nwa has a creature [grabbed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=20) with her hair, the creature cannot breathe and must succeed at a DC 5 flat check any time they attempt an action that involves speaking (including [linguistic](/Traits.aspx?ID=101) effects and Casting a Spell with a verbal component). On a failure, the action is disrupted.

**Empowered Hair**   Tak-nwa has mastered using her prehensile hair in combat. She can use her living hair to perform precise tasks such as picking up objects and performing simple Interact actions. She can also deliver hexes through her hair. Whenever Tak-nwa successfully casts a hex focus spell that requires 2 or more actions to cast and that doesn't require a spell attack roll, if her target is within reach, as part of the spellcasting activity she can make a hair Strike against the foe before applying any effects of the hex. If this Strike misses, the hex has no effect.

**Familiar**   Tak-nwa's familiar is an elephant hawk moth named Yon-so. Yon-so has a fly Speed of 40 feet, [darkvision](/Familiars.aspx?ID=5), and [scent](/Familiars.aspx?ID=11) as an imprecise sense to a range of 30 feet.

</column>
name: Syu Tak-nwa (Level 16)
